After prayers the family return home for a meal like the one on Friday night but without any candles, as it is considered work to light the candles.
After dinner the family may either have a shabbos sleep, or rest. At about two o'clock in the afternoon until five o'clock the children can go to a group if their parents wish them to. At the group the children will learn Hebrew and play. While the children are at the group the parents will go to Synagogue.
